Class PizzaOrder

  • java.lang.Object
    • PizzaOrder
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    C5Question8

    public class PizzaOrder
extends java.lang.Object
    The PizzaOrder class is a wrapper for 1-3 pizzas allowing a person to emulate an order of pizza.
    Since:
    22 March 2016
    Author:
    Mark Eikel

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected int num_pizzas 
      private Pizza[] pizzas 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PizzaOrder()
      Empty constructor, sets num of pizzas automatically to 3, the max amount.
      PizzaOrder(int nP)
      Allows the user to initialize with a certain number of pizzas to be placed within.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Pizza[] getPizzas()
      Accessor for the array of pizzas.
      double getTotal()
      Calculates the total cost of the pizzas inside the pizzas array.
      void setNumPizzas(int numPizzas)
      Sets the amount of pizzas in the class by changing int num_pizzas to the desired.
      void setPizza1(Pizza pizza1)
      Fills the 1nd pizza in a pizza order with a given pizza.
      void setPizza2(Pizza pizza2)
      Fills the 2nd pizza in a pizza order with a given pizza.
      void setPizza3(Pizza pizza3)
      Fills the 3rd pizza in a pizza order with a given pizza.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Outputs the descriptions of each pizza.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PizzaOrder

        public PizzaOrder()
        Empty constructor, sets num of pizzas automatically to 3, the max amount.

      • PizzaOrder

        public PizzaOrder(int nP)
        Allows the user to initialize with a certain number of pizzas to be placed within.
        Parameters:
        nP - number of pizzas to set the number as.

    • Method Detail

      • getPizzas

        public Pizza[] getPizzas()
        Accessor for the array of pizzas. By default has a length of 3, use int num_pizzas for size.
        Returns:
        The internal array of pizzas.

      • getTotal

        public double getTotal()
        Calculates the total cost of the pizzas inside the pizzas array.
        Returns:
        The total cost of pizzas

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Outputs the descriptions of each pizza.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        The description of the pizzas.

      • setNumPizzas

        public void setNumPizzas(int numPizzas)
        Sets the amount of pizzas in the class by changing int num_pizzas to the desired.
        Parameters:
        numPizzas - number of pizzas to have in the pizza order

      • setPizza1

        public void setPizza1(Pizza pizza1)
        Fills the 1nd pizza in a pizza order with a given pizza.
        Parameters:
        pizza1 - The pizza to be copied into the array.

      • setPizza2

        public void setPizza2(Pizza pizza2)
        Fills the 2nd pizza in a pizza order with a given pizza.
        Parameters:
        pizza2 - The pizza to be copied into the array.
